text: Hanki zamagrama mago vahe'mofo hozama ke zamasanema nehu'za, ana mopa enerize. Hagi mago vahe'mofo noma erinakura ana nomofo venafo azeri haviza nehu'za noma'a eneri'za, vahera rezamatga hu'za fenozmine nozminena eneriza, naga'zamimo'zama erisantima hare'naza mopa havige hu'za zamazeri havia hu'za eri nafa'a nehaze.
